Translations.Text: Te'om birakta prakasa karaile arau mukha ghuraa'i la’le
te'omra ocarata andha byaktijana ahara karane
Kihe tomaka janaba ye, hayato si paraisud'dha ha’ba
athaba upadesa grahana karaiba arau se'i upadesa tara babe labhajanaka ha’ba
Arau yiye nijake amukhapeksi buli bharae
tumi tara prati manoyoga dicha
Athaca si paraisud'dha naha’le tomara kono dayitba na'i
anahate yiye tomara ocaralai daurai ahile
arau si (allahaka) bhayo karae
tara prati tumi udasina ha’la
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'ito upadesa bani
gatike yiye iccha karaiba siye'i iyaka smarana raakhiba
e'ito maryada sampanna chahiphata lipibad'dha
Samunnata, paraitra
lekhaka ba dutasakalara hatata
(Yisakala) mahasanmanita, punyabana
Manuha dhbansa ha'omka, kimana ye akrtajna
te'om taka ki bastura paraa srsti karaiche
sukrabindura paraa, te'om taka srsti karaiche, pichata tara paraimita bikasa sadhana karaiche
tara pichata tara babe patha sahaja karai diche
tara pichata taka mrtyu pradana karaile arau kabarastha karaile
Akau yetiya te'om iccha karaiba taka punarjiraita karaiba
Ketiya'o nahaya, te'om taka yi adesa karaichila seya si etiya'o purna karaa na'i
Eteke manuhe nija khadyara prati laksya karaa ucita
Niscaya ami pracura paraimane pani barsana karaom
Tara pichata ami prthiraika yathayathabharae bidirna karaom
tara pichata ami tata utpanna karaom sasya
anura arau saka-pacali
yayatuna arau khejura gacha
ghana gacha-gachani bisista udyana
phala-mula arau trna-ghamha
e'ibora tomalokara arau tomalokara gharaciya jantura jiranopakaranara babe
Eteke yetiya tiksna sabda ahiba
se'idina manuhe palayana karaiba tara bhatrra paraa
arau tara maka-bapekara paraa
tara strai arau santanara paraa
se'idina sihamta pratyakarae ha’ba ene eka gurautara arastha yito taka sampurnaraupe byasta raakhiba
Se'idina kichumana ceheraa ha’ba ujjbala
hamhirae bharaa, anandata utphulla
arau se'idina kichumana ceheraa dhulirae malina ha’ba
ka’la ararane ararai dharaiba
E'omloke'i kaphira, atyanta papi
Suryaka yetiya nisprabha karaa ha’ba
arau naksatraraaji yetiya khahi paraiba
parbatasamuhaka yetiya sancalita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya purna gabhini utaboraka ayatne erai diya ha’ba
arau yetiya banaraiya pasuboraka ekatraita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya sagarasamuhaka agni'uttala karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya atmasamuhaka (samagotraiyasakalara lagata) milita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya jiranta samadhistha kan'yasisuka sodha ha’ba
ki aparaadhata ta'ika hatya karaa haichila
arau yetiya amalanamasamuha unmocita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya akasara ararana apasaraita karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya jahannamaka bhisanabharae prajjbalita karaa ha’ba
arau jannataka yetiya nikatabarti karaa ha’ba
tetiya pratyeka byaktiye'i janiba si ki upasthita karaiche
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho arartanasila naksatraborara
yibora gatisila, adrsya
arau raatira sapata yetiya i bidaya laya
arau prabhatara sapata yetiya iyara abirbhara haya
niscaya e'i kora'ana sanmanita raachule lai aha bani
Yijana saktisali, arasbara malikara ocarata maryadasampanna
man'yabara, tata te'om bisbasta
Arau tomalokara sangi unmada nahaya
arau te'om te'omka spasta digantata dekhiche
Arau te'om gayebi bisaya samparke krpanali'o nakarae
Arau eya kono abhisapta cayatanarao bakya nahaya
Eteke tomaloke konaphale gati karaicha
e'ito kerala samagra jagatabasira babe upadesa bani
tara babe, tomalokara majara yiye sarala pathata caliba bicarae
Tomaloke iccha karaiba noraaraa, yetiya laike bisbajagatara pratipalaka allahe iccha nakarae
